install.name: JBolo!
install.author: TechJoomla
install.description: Chat Module to show list of online users or to show Chat Bar

param.name: modorbar
param.label: Display Option
param.description: Select option to display Bar or Module
Number of chat user buttons to be shown on the slider
param.label: Facebook-Slider Options
param.name: slideroptions
groupselect
param.label: Enable Group Integration(Make sure that you have the correct option set in JBolo component)
param.description: NOTE that this is not a group chat but group integration. It allows you to integrate the chat with other group components

param.name: persongroup
param.label: Show only users from the persons subscribed groups
param.description: Allows you to integrate the chat with other group components

param.name: pagegroup
param.label: Show group users on Group Pages
param.description: Allows you to integrate the chat with other group components

param.name: posttext
param.label: Enter Position Name for Activity
param.description: This is the position where the SuperActivity Module needs to be published

param.name: intensiveupdate
param.label: Enable Intensive Ajax Update(Requires more Bandwidth)
param.description: This will update the User List using Ajax instantaneously

param.name: theme
param.label: Select theme for the bar
param.description: Currently there are 2 themes available i.e. Black3D and GradientGrey

param.name: showguestbar
param.label: Show bar to guests
param.description: With this option you can choose if you want to show the chat bar to your guests as well as logged in users.

param.name: disableactivities
param.label: Disable the Activities tab on the bar?
param.description: This will disable the Activities tab on the bar

param.name: iconsfields
param.label: Please Select the Icons you want to Hide (only for ChatBar)
param.description: Hides the icon on the FB Bar
